overview:
My full name is Nguyen Xuan Tai (Mr.); I am now CEO of Naiscorp Information Technology Service Joint-stock company. I was born on 15/10/1983 and graduated from Hanoi University of Technology in 2006.

After finished university, me and some of my friends (founders) started with the establishment of the company originally consisted of few staffs. We have successfully persuaded the two strategic investors IDG and Softbank China & India Holdings in 2006 and 2008 and has been proposed acquisition by Google for Vietnamese search technology when released development.

Earlier, I won numerous awards scientific research first, second, third level and allocation policy and they are many research works about Vietnamese language search technology to reach the prize.

One of the biggest projects we did successful is to build databases and search tools for Vietnam Government Portal (www.chinhphu.vn). I myself have a passionate of information technology and believe that our company has ability to produce the best solution, best product & service to serve customer and user to access, search and exploit information effectively and speedily with affordable price. Socbay Search and Socbay iMedia are some first products that we continue in developing with innovation to meet that demands.

Here below is some of references information: http://www.forbes.com/2009/12/09/vietnam-google-socbay-intelligent-technology-fannin.html (Turning down Google)

http://vnexpress.net/gl/kinh-doanh/kinh-nghiem/2010/12/3ba2417c/ (bio artcle on the first & biggest e-news in Vietnam)

http://www.pcworld.com.vn/articles/quan-ly/giao-thuong/2010/01/1195250/ceo-nguyen-xuan-tai-tong-giam-doc-cong-ty-naiscorp-muon-vuon-ra-bien-lon/
